name: Collapsed Temple
description: A sacred temple that once served as a center of worship now lies in ruins, its religious significance still palpable. The spiritual energy and potential magical artifacts attract clerics and scholars, while the sacred nature can provide protection or attract supernatural attention.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers that once echoed with prayer. Air carries old incense, divine power, and lost faith dust scent. Sacred architecture lies in ruins but spiritual energy still pulses through broken stones. Skin tingles with presence of divine power and potential magical artifacts. Taste of spiritual energy and lost devotion fills mouth. Weight of religious significance and supernatural attention presses down on you.
